Jeff Bezos made $3,715 in just ONE second — tha…

retweeted_status.full_text:
I want you stop scrolling for just a moment. Take one second and pause.

Jeff Bezos made $3,715 in just ONE second — that's more than the median full-time worker in this country earns in an entire week.

Please do not tell me he cannot afford to pay his fair share of taxes.

tweets.full_text:
RT @BernieSanders: The reality now is that we are living in an oligarchic society. 

The top 1% owns more wealth than the bottom 92%. Over…

retweeted_status.full_text:
The reality now is that we are living in an oligarchic society. 

The top 1% owns more wealth than the bottom 92%. Over the last 30 years, the top 1%'s wealth has increased by $21 trillion while the bottom half's declined. 

Is that the kind of country we are satisfied with?

retweeted_status.full_text:
عظمة #فاطمة (ع) 
عندما تخفق حبًّا بالجار قبل الدار
وعندما تحلق في صلاتها مع الملأ الأعلى
وعندما تلينُ خُلقًا يحكي أباها
وعندما تصدح بالحق قولًا
وتخط بالعدل موقفًا
روعتها عندما تغيب الذات همًّا
لتستحيل رسالة عاشت بين الناس
وتشرق من خلف الرحيل حضنًا يسع كل ساعٍ للنور في مدى الزمن.
